blogPost.excerpt: Get safer and more effective workouts at home with 1:1 voice feedback to improve your posture and encouragement to push you further. Counts reps as you do them ⏱️ Instant suggestions on improving posture 🗨️ Cheers you throughout your training session 🗣️

blogPost.title: Physique AI (Android & iOS) - AI-powered 1:1 posture correction to improve home workouts
blogPost.author: Vignesh Prabhu

localize.description: 通过1：1语音反馈改善您的姿势，并鼓励您进一步推动，在家中获得更安全、更有效的锻炼。在您做代表时计算他们的数量⏱️关于改进姿势的即时建议🗨️在整个培训课程中为您干杯🗣️
localize.tagline: 人工智能支持的1：1姿势校正，可改善家庭锻炼

localize.description: 通過1：1語音反饋改善您的姿勢，並鼓勵您進一步推動，在家中獲得更安全、更有效的鍛鍊。在您做代表時計算他們的數量⏱️關於改進姿勢的即時建議🗨️在整個培訓課程中爲您乾杯🗣️
localize.tagline: 人工智能支持的1：1姿勢校正，可改善家庭鍛鍊

previous.excerpt: 1 Second Everyday is a video diary that makes it easy to take your day-to-day moments and create a meaningful movie of your life. It’s a home for all your notable memories, not just the Insta-worthy. Get started with 1SE today!
previous.title: 1 Second Everyday 4.0 - A movie that includes every day of the rest of your life

localize.description: 1秒每一天是一个视频日记，可以轻松地拍摄你的日常时刻，并为你的生活创造一部有意义的电影。它是你所有值得注意的记忆的家，而不仅仅是值得在Insta上使用的。今天就开始使用1SE吧！
localize.tagline: 一部包含你生活中睡觉每一天的电影
